title: Unsending Messages on Instagram: Everything You Need to Know

steps.title: Open the Instagram app.
steps.content: Open the Instagram app. This looks like a camera with a multicolored background. Log into your account if you aren't already. You can also use Instagram in a web browser at https://www.instagram.com/ .

steps.title: Tap the airplane icon.
steps.content: Tap the airplane icon. This is in the top-right corner of the screen. On some devices, this may look like a lightning bolt in a speech bubble.

steps.title: Tap a conversation.
steps.content: Tap a conversation. You'll see a list of your Direct Messages from newest to oldest.

steps.title: Tap and hold the message you want to unsend.
steps.content: Tap and hold the message you want to unsend. If you're using Instagram on a computer, click ••• next to the message.

steps.title: Tap Unsend twice.
steps.content: Tap Unsend twice. The message will be unsent. It will no longer be visible in the chat.

steps.title: Messages in Direct Messages can be unsent.
steps.content: Messages in Direct Messages can be unsent. Direct Messages are private conversations with an Instagram user. This also includes group messages. If you posted a comment on someone's uploaded photo, you can delete it on the post itself.

steps.title: Instagram doesn't notify you when a message is unsent.
steps.content: Instagram doesn't notify you when a message is unsent. However, if you took a while to unsend the message, the recipient may have already read it. The recipient may also have their Read Receipts turned off. Additionally, if the chat gets reported, the unsent message may appear in the report. [1] X Research source

steps.title: No, you can't edit a sent Direct Message.
steps.content: No, you can't edit a sent Direct Message. Once the message has been sent, your only option is to unsend it, and then send a new one. Additionally, there's no way to edit a posted comment ; you'll need to delete the comment.

steps.title: You can only unsend one message at a time.
steps.content: You can only unsend one message at a time. While time-consuming, Instagram has yet to incorporate a way to select and unsend more than one message at a time. Until then, you'll need to go through each chat message individually, select it, and then unsend it. Deleting Instagram messages is different from unsending. While you can delete multiple messages at a time, this only happens on your end. The recipient will still see your message unless you unsend it.
